public class Moon extends Planet
This class represents Moon object and is child of Planet object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Moon

      public Moon(SolarSystem s, SpaceObject centrum, double distance, double angle, double size, double velocity, String col)
      Constructor of the moon class
      Parameters:
      s - SolarSystem object
      centrum - Space object on whose orbit this moon is.
      distance - Distance from centrum to the moon.
      angle - Starting angle of moon on orbit
      size - Diameter of the moon
      velocity - Velocity of its movement around orbit.
      col - Color of this moon. Can be string e.g "WHITE" or RGB "#463FBD"
